Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="Command"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Function" Type="System.String" Value="Account.UpdateMsisdnLanguage"/> <Attribute Name="Msisdn" Type="System.String" Value="##msisdn##"/> <Attribute Name="NewLanguageCode" Type="System.String" Value="##NewLanguageCode##"/> </Attributes> </DataSet>
